cmd_getlink: Your anonymous chat link:\n{link}\nShare this link so others can message you anonymously.
start_no_param: Welcome! If you opened the bot via an invite link, just send your message.
start_owner_self: You're the owner of this anonymous chat link.
start_joined: You're connected to an anonymous chat session. Send your message.
start_owner_notified: A new anonymous user joined your session.
start_session_save_error: Couldn't create the session. Please try again later.
start_wrong_param: Invalid start parameter. Please use the invite link.
payment_not_allowed: You can't pay for this message.
spam_blocked: Your message was detected as spam and was not sent.
must_join_or_reply: To send messages, open the session via the link. If you are the owner, tap "Reply" under the message.
cannot_self_message: You can't message yourself via your own link.
message_sent_to_owner: Your message was sent to the owner.
invoice_desc: Pay {stars}‚≠ê to reveal who sent this anonymous message.
invoice_error: Couldn't create the payment. Please try again later.
pay_support_default: Payment support: contact the bot admin (e.g. @your_admin).
msg_reply_instruction: Now type your reply and send it. It will be delivered to the anonymous user.
cb_reply_not_allowed: You can't reply to this message.
msg_repeat_owner: Please resend the message (you can edit and send again).
